original_title: Björk: The Inner or Deep Part of an Animal or Plant Structure
overview: Official DVD released by Björk about the making of the Medúlla album. The DVD features clips of the studio performances by Dokaka, Shlomo, Rahzel and Mike Patton that formed the beats for many of the songs on the album. The title of the DVD is the actual definition of the word "Medúlla".
title: Björk: The Inner or Deep Part of an Animal or Plant Structure
